thread.section_title: Take Charge America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Take Charge America | www.takechargeamerica.org
thread.title: Brett
thread.title_full: Take Charge America reviewed by Brett

author: Brett
title: Brett
text: Take charge America got me back on track financially. Very easy to work with and I will recommend them to friends and family that may encounter financial hardship. Top notch professionals and very knowledgeable!!! If you are having trouble with debt collectors I strongly suggest you to call TCA, you will be able to breathe again and get on with your life.
